After Sales+Service Management+Service S.FORMULA: (Number of No-Show Appointments / Total Number of Scheduled Appointments) * 100

After Sales+Service Management+Service S.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for scheduling each service appointment, including administrative and operational expenses.
